uuid.description:
Unique identifier of the brand.
If not provided by the manufacturer, the UUID can be derived as specified in [the UUID section](/uuid).

countries_of_origin.description:
Example: CZ, US

List of all countries where the brand has manufacturing facilities.

keywords.description:
Example: Prusa, Prusa3D

Additional strings the brand can be matched against during searches.

material_url_template.description:
Example: https://prusament.com/materials/{id}/

`{id}` gets replaced by Material::brand_specific_id
`{uuid}` gets replaced by Material::uuid

material_package_url_template.description:
Example: https://www.prusa3d.com/cs/produkt/{id}/

`{id}` gets replaced by MaterialPackage::brand_specific_id
`{uuid}` gets replaced by MaterialPackage::uuid

type.description:
Example: `material`

Type of object the link is referring to

pattern.description:
Example: `https://prusament\.com/spool/\?spoolId=(?<MaterialPackageInstance_uuid>\d+)/`

Regex pattern for matching the link. The regex is required to use named capturing groups, where the group name is the captured property name in the form of `object_property`
